suggest.meta_keywords: Azion Edge Network, Azion Peering Policy, Edge Computing, Peering Requirements, Autonomous System 52580, Edge Data Centers, Global Edge Locations, Network Scalability, Internet Service Providers, PeeringDB AS52580
suggest.meta_description: Explore the Azion Edge Network and its peering policies. Learn about the technical requirements and benefits for ISPs across global edge locations.

current.meta_description: Founded in 2011, Azion enables you to build and run serverless applications at the edge of the network or your own premisses, closer to users and devices.
